title: 409. The Side Effects of Social Distancing
description: In just a few weeks, the novel coronavirus has undone a century’s worth of our economic and social habits. What consequences will this have on our future — and is there a silver lining in this very black pandemic cloud?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
